name: Quantic Social Image Hover
author: Taurean Wooley

sections.description:
TW Image Hover Share allows you to share every image on your page higher than 300px in width and 100px in height.

Just hover over the image and you’ll see the TW Image Hover menu. Click on the menu to share and instantly start sharing
images throughout the internet.
sections.installation:
Upload the TW Image Hover plugin to your blog, Activate it.

Go to settings page on your admin panel, select your social networks and layout. Do not forget to click submit.
sections.changelog:
1.0.8

  • updated to allow for instant donations using paypal

1.0.7

  • reverted old changes to mirror better performance for websites with large files

1.0.6

  • fixed issue with setup_images wait time

1.0.5

  • fixed minor issue with loading images

1.0.4

  • fixed issue with share menu which should allow for people to connect their
    shares without installing the wordpress plugin as well as sharing directly
    on quanticpost.com (coming soon)

1.0.3

  • added the ability to share image or post itself
  • fixed issue with the animations and other options

1.0.2

  • fixed issue with linking directly to the social media networks on multiple clicks.
  • fixed issue with uploading information to main server

1.0

  • initial upload
